trans-unit.source: Provides control capability to represent a label control for displaying text on a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項功能，以代表行動裝置上顯示文字的標籤控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class, provides the string that is rendered as the label.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>屬性，都繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>類別，提供會呈現為標籤的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the Label class.
trans-unit.target: 建立標籤類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。
